verbose_text: TGF-beta signaling through TGFBR1 / ALK5 receptor to the Smad2/3 cascade inhibits endothelial cell activation, maintaining endothelial quiescence, whereas TGF-beta signaling through the ACVRL1 / ALK1 receptor to the Smad1/5 cascade promotes the migration and proliferation of endothelial cells.
evidence: TGF-beta signaling through the ACVRL1/ALK1 receptor to the Smad1/5 cascade promotes the migration and proliferation
